Posts.Content: On Mar 11, 2011 4:21 AM yorkydee wrote: I stopped the Femara 2 days after I wrote that post.  I started Aromasin 1 week after that.  It wasn't so bad in the beginning but now, 3 months later, it is starting to be as bad as Femara.  I made appt for next week to tell the doctor she must deal with this pain or I quit....PERIOD!  I will no longer accept the "Take a tylenol or naproxen." because this pain is way, way, way beyond that.  I took 2 dilaudids from my back surgery and that didn't ease the Aromasin pain to a tolerable level.  Some of my current symptoms are.... Trigger finger/catches and locks Severe, debilitating joint pain from hips to balls of my feet and bilateral wrists and hands.  Feels like my hands are going to snap off at the wrists. weight gain headaches muscle spasms in my legs, feet and toes loss of energy neuropathy, verified nerve damage can't walk after sitting for a few minutes, feel like I'm 100 yrs old hot flashes feel like my fingers are swollen triple their size but when I look at them and they appear normal in size.  I can't do puzzles, sew, or groom my dogs because my hands don't work. legs, hands, feet throb 24/7 I'm sure there are more but I can't remember all of the problems.  Oh yes, memory problems too. Oh my goodness...I've just found this thread of messages and it seems that I am reading my own thoughts.  I am having so much joint pain and wasn't sure what was going on.  I am taking Aleve everyday..and it does seem to help..but when I sit for a while ... getting up is a real trial.  I mentioned the pain to my oncologist and he said that was one of the side effects of Aromasin...but he didn't elaborate and I wasn't sure that was the sole cause so I didn't pursue it....I will do so when next I see him.  Thank you to everyone who has responded...just knowing that all of this isn't 'in my mind'....has helped me tremendously...Grace to you all...
Posts.Title: Side Effects From Aromasin
